All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddEditFragment
Abstract class `AddEditFragment` serves as a base class for fragments involved in adding or editing elements.
AttachImageFragment
AttachImageFragment is responsible for handling image attachment functionalities.
AttachImageFragment.OnImageSelectedListener
An interface which allows for an image selection to be handled by another class
BarcodeDetectionTest
This is a test class for the `ScanGalleryFragment` in an Android application.
BarcodeHandleChain
Class representing a chain of responsibility for handling barcode requests.
BarcodeValidHandler
Implementation of CustomHandler used for validating barcode formats.
ColorSpinnerAdapter
The `ColorSpinnerAdapter` class is a custom ArrayAdapter used to populate a Spinner with TagColor objects, representing colors.
ColorSpinnerAdapterTest
 
CustomHandler
Interface defining the structure for handling barcode requests in a chain of responsibility.
DeletePopupFragment
An instance of this class represents a popup which allows the user to confirm or cancel a deletion action
EditTextCharacterLimitWatcher
EditTextCharacterLimitWatcher is a TextWatcher implementation that monitors an EditText's input and enforces a maximum character limit.
ExpenseFragment
A fragment class that displays summary information related to expenses and tags.
ExpenseListAdapter
An adapter which displays expenses by tag
Filter
 
FilterDialog
 
FilterListAdapter
 
FilterListAdapter.ViewHolder
 
FilterTagAdapter
 
FilterTagAdapter.ViewHolder
 
GoogleAuthDB
The `GoogleAuthDB` class represents a user profile in a Firebase authentication system.
GoogleSignInActivity
The `GoogleSignInActivity` class represents the activity responsible for handling Google Sign-In authentication.
ImageRecyclerAdapter
An adapter to display a list of images
InventoryAddEditFragment
Fragments of this class allow the user to input information relating to and item This is an abstract class with two subclasses, one relating to adding items and one related to editing items
InventoryAddFragment
A Fragment responsible for adding a new item to the inventory.
InventoryDB
Handles interactions with the Firestore database for managing inventory items.
InventoryDB.OnGetImagesCallback
 
InventoryDBTest
 
InventoryEditFragment
A Fragment responsible for editing an inventory item's details.
InventoryFragment
A Fragment that displays and manages an inventory of items.
InventoryFunctionalityTest
 
InventoryListAdapter
A custom ArrayAdapter for populating an inventory list view with Item objects.
InventorySortTest
 
Item
The `Item` class represents an inventory item, storing information such as name, tags, date of purchase, estimated value, make, model, serial number, description, comment, ID, and date of the last update.
ItemImageTest
This test checks the UI of the add image fragment and checks if the application can open camera and gallery
ItemList
This class represents a list of items which extends default arraylist behavior to include functionality such as comparison between items and total expense calculation
MainActivity
The main activity of the application, responsible for handling the user interface and navigation between main fragments.
NavigationManager
The `NavigationManager` class provides a utility method for swapping out the currently displayed fragment with a new one.
Profile
Represents a user profile containing basic information such as name, bio, email, and profile picture.
ProfileDB
The ProfileDB class is responsible for interacting with the Firebase Firestore database to perform operations related to user profiles.
ProfileDB.OnProfileRetrievedListener
Interface to define a callback for Profile retrieval.
ProfileDBTest
The ProfileDBTest class contains unit tests for the ProfileDB class methods.
ProfileEditFragment
 
ProfileFragment
A fragment that represents the user profile screen.
ProfileFunctionalityTest
The ProfileFunctionalityTest class contains unit tests for the ProfileEditFragment class methods.
ScanCameraFragment
This class represents a Fragment for scanning barcodes using the device's camera.
ScanFragment
The `ScanFragment` class represents a fragment for initiating barcode scanning operations.
ScanFragmentTest
Espresso UI test for the ScanFragment functionality.
ScanGalleryFragment
Fragments of this class are responsible for allowing the user to select a barcode image and automatically filling information from that image into an InventoryAddFragment if the image is valid
SettingsFragment
 
SortingTest
This tests that sorting is preformed correctly on an itemList
SpacingItemDecoration
 
StringFormatter
This class provides static methods for formatting certain data common throughout the program as strings
Tag
This class represents a tag which can be applied to an item for the purposes of sorting and filtering Tags contain data such as name, databaseID, color, and description, and provide methods for updating or retrieving data.
TagAdapter
A custom ArrayAdapter for populating an inventory list view with Item objects.
TagAddEditFragment
The fragment responsible for handling user data input related to the creation or editing of tags.
TagAddFragment
A fragment responsible for adding tags
TagColor
This class represents an object which is displayed by a ColorSpinnerAdapter specifically these represent colors that can be chosen for tags
TagDB
Handles interactions with the Firestore database for managing inventory items.
TagDB.OnGetTagsCallback
An interface which calling classes can implement in order to execute code upon the completion of the getAllTagsTask
TagDBTest
 
TagEditFragment
A fragment responsible for editing tags
TagFragment
A fragment responsible for viewing, editing, and adding tags
TagFunctionalityTest
 
TestMainActivity
 
TotalExpenseTest
 
UserAccountTest
This tests whether changes to the database of a user is reflected in the app It also tests whether changes to the database of other users affects what appears in the app (it should not)
WebScrapingHandler
Implementation of CustomHandler specifically designed for web scraping functionality.
